title: FS: Old Judge N172 Dummy Hoy 238-2 Batting Pose
author: gfgcom

posts.post_title: FS: Old Judge N172 Dummy Hoy 238-2 Batting Pose
posts.post_content:
Found a nice desirable example of Dummy Hoy, 
William Ellsworth "Dummy" Hoy (May 23, 1862 – December 15, 1961)

Very nice clean card, small hinge or tape mark on the back ( see scan) no creases small chip on lower left corner.

[IMG]https://www.gfg.com/cardimg/403/86464.jpg[/IMG]

Best offer over $2,800 takes it.

posting this on Monday morning, 1/24/2022,so if you are interested in this card, in the event that there are offers and more than one, please make your offer by Wednesday, and if you have the highest offer I will contact you Wednesday evening to make arrangements.

Thanks

Dave
Dave's Vintage Baseball Cards
has this card sold yet?  thanks, Randy
